After having their target destroy ninety-nine of their [[puppet]]s with each puppet driving a "bolt" into the target, the destruction of the hundredth puppet allows the user to effectively take full control of a person's body in a similar manner to the [[Puppet Performance: Skilful Achievement with a Human Body]] technique without the person's cooperation. This technique may cause pain to the victim as seen when [[Shizuka]] was yelling in pain.
